amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? TITLE VI--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? Sec. 601. None of the funds appropriated in this Act may be used to implement Paragraph 4.F of "Public Affairs Guidance On Casualty and Mortuary Affairs in Military Operations," (R 311900Z) March 2003.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to implement Paragraph 4.F of "Public Affairs Guidance on Casualty and Mortuary Affairs in Military Operations".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A009) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A009) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
